thread.title: Philip Cotton

author: Philip Cotton
title: Philip Cotton
text:
Never heard of this company before so always a little bit wary when found online but they were excellent.
Very easy and flexible to book, received email on the day with a 2 hour slot, engineer (Nick) called 30 mins before he was due and arrived almost to the minute on time. Nick was very friendly and got on with the job, completing promptly.
The price was also very competitive which means I am struggling to think of how this service could have been any better.
Thanks
